pages.text: A chinese armor that is made with lamellar armor pices. this kind of armor is flexible and will provied more Armor toughness.

pages.title: Ming Guang armor
pages.text: Enhanced lamellar armor that provied more armor toughness than the sdandard one. 'Ming Guang' means shining in Chinese, two metal disc Sparkling in the sunlight and bring a sense of brave to the warriors wearing it.
